display_name: [Shadow Dragon on the Righteous Path] Nuova Shenron

kit.leader_skill: "Shadow Dragon Saga" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +80%

super_attack.name: Flame Shot
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF by 44% for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy

ultra_super_attack.name: Burst Attack
ultra_super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF by 44% for 4 turns; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Incarnation of the Four-Star Ball
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +4 and ATK & DEF 144% up; When there is another "Shadow Dragon Saga" Category ally attacking in the same turn or a "Shadow Dragon Saga" Category enemy: Ki +4; Chance of performing a critical hit 44% up; When facing only 1 enemy, or when all allies attacking in the same turn are Extreme Class characters: Ki +4; Launches 2 additional attacks, each of which has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; When attacking with 14 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 244% up; Damage reduction rate 24% up; When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki: ATK 244% up; Chance of performing a critical hit 44% up; When receiving a Ki Blast Super Attack: Nullifies it for 4 turns from the character's entry turn; Great chance of nullifying it starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn
